name: Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine

Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine seating capacity is 5 People. Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine mileage is 17.5 km/l. Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine has received 5 Star (Euro NCAP) safety rating.Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine car is available in 2 versions and 2 fuel options - petrol and diesel. Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine petrol models comes with 1332cc engine which generates a peak power of 161 bhp @ 5500 rpm .The new Mercedes A-Class Limousine a Sedan from Mercedes-Benz was launched in India in May 2023. A-Class Limousine has received a 88% rating score from our users. A-Class Limousine is preferred for its styling and comfort.
        Mercedes-Benz A-Class Limousine competes with BMW 2 Series Gran Coupe Audi A4 and Mercedes-Benz C-Class in India.
